channel.title: Euthymia Alpha stage
channel.description:
Forums- http://www.euthymias.net/index.php?action=forum
Well I've been working with this base, and well it has some stuff, so i decided to take this project, i'm aiming this to be a good project, what do i mean? I do plan on hosting this and getting lots of players if possible, but that is close because i have been getting some support from my parents. The server will have little fun things like quests, obv the green dragons and such. The skills aren't all working but i'm aiming to complete all of them if possible or most. I'm the only developer for now, and probably won't have developers. I'm aiming to do a fun server, Something like fagex did back be4 08 but not a remake since it has customs quests, and "Small fun things" like Interactive objects and npcs. Wanna learn more? visit the forums by clicking the link above. [url=http://euthymia.createaforum.com/index.php?action=forum]Click here to be redirected to forums.[/url] So I've started developing Euthymia and got some stuff so far Quests: * Animal i have become -This quest is about a woman having problems on controling her self -Quest rewards = Heal&Energy Whenever you're with her. * Teacher in hurry -A teacher has lost his book, what will he do now? -You'll have to make a new one for him. -20 Thieving is required. -Quest Rewards = half of his pay and xp. Pathfinding: * Following -No walking through objects while following * Combat Following -No walking through object while following [img]http://s12.postimg.org/ssb36iqyl/euthymia1_1.png[/img] [img]http://s12.postimg.org/cvcb9sykd/euthymia1_2.png[/img] Skills: *Thieving -Fixed xp rates and rewards for mans. [img]http://d2bm3ljpacyxu8.cloudfront.net/width/580/crop/0,0,580x381/euthymia.webs.com/New%20source%205.png[/img] Shops: *General Stores -Started basic stores. [img]http://d2bm3ljpacyxu8.cloudfront.net/width/518/crop/0,0,518x343/euthymia.webs.com/New%20source%208.png[/img] *Misc -Added Day night/system -Ghosts spawn in draynor manor at night (in home) [img]http://s12.postimg.org/ecxrld3b1/euthymia1_4.png[/img] -emotions work. [img]http://s12.postimg.org/r31zygb99/euthymia1_3.png[/img] Animal i have become quest [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/6rpnc3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/8x3igz.jpg[/img] Home [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/16jr0pd.jpg[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/e7e6x2.jpg[/img] Thieving [img]http://d2bm3ljpacyxu8.cloudfront.net/width/580/crop/0,0,580x382/euthymia.webs.com/New%20source%209.png[/img] Quest points: [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2mflwsw.jpg[/img] I'll add more media and content later. I'm still uploading pictures.

item.title: Euthymia Alpha stage
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Forums- http://www.euthymias.net/index.php?action=forum

Well I've been working with this base, and well it has some stuff, so i decided to take this project, i'm aiming this to be a good project, what do i mean? I do plan on hosting this and getting lots of players if possible, but that is close because i have been getting some support from my parents.

The server will have little fun things like quests, obv the green dragons and such.
The skills aren’t all working but i’m aiming to complete all of them if possible or most.
I’m the only developer for now, and probably won’t have developers.

I’m aiming to do a fun server, Something like fagex did back be4 08 but not a remake since it has customs quests, and “Small fun things” like Interactive objects and npcs.

Wanna learn more? visit the forums by clicking the link above.

Click here to be redirected to forums.

So I’ve started developing Euthymia and got some stuff so far

Quests:
* Animal i have become
-This quest is about a woman having problems on controling her self
-Quest rewards = Heal&Energy Whenever you’re with her.
* Teacher in hurry
-A teacher has lost his book, what will he do now?
-You’ll have to make a new one for him.
-20 Thieving is required.
-Quest Rewards = half of his pay and xp.

Pathfinding:
* Following
-No walking through objects while following
* Combat Following
-No walking through object while following


Skills:
*Thieving
-Fixed xp rates and rewards for mans.

Shops:
*General Stores
-Started basic stores.

*Misc
-Added Day night/system
-Ghosts spawn in draynor manor at night (in home)

-emotions work.

Animal i have become quest
